holidays.title: Bathukamma Starting Day
holidays.description: Bathukamma is a day that honors the gods for the blessings they have bestowed upon us.

holidays.title: Be Bald and Be Free Day
holidays.description: Get ready for a new style statement. Be bald and be free!

holidays.title: Bookshop Day
holidays.description: If you can read this, you can read a whole book — buy one today!

holidays.title: Chisinau City Day
holidays.description: Moldova and Chisinau have a rich history and festivals are celebrated with merriment and reverence.

holidays.title: Day of Svetitskovloba
holidays.description: Let’s explore the history of the Svetitskhoveli Cathedral and appreciate its significance.

holidays.title: Day of the Defender
holidays.description: Join us as we celebrate Ukraine’s defenders, history, and rich traditions.

holidays.title: I Love Yarn Day
holidays.description: Yarn lovers, gather around and share your love. The world needs a little more yarn.

holidays.title: International African Penguin Awareness Day
holidays.description: Get your flippers ready as we enter the world of one of nature’s most endearing birds.

holidays.title: Liberation Day in Yemen
holidays.description: Today we celebrate Yemen’s freedom as a nation! Join us right here at National Today!

holidays.title: Mahalaya
holidays.description: West Bengal, Odisha, Karnataka, and Tripura, your time has come to celebrate Mahalaya.

holidays.title: Mwalimu Nyerere Day
holidays.description: In 1962, Julius Nyerere became the first elected president of Tanganyika.

holidays.title: National Chess Day
holidays.description: Mentally stimulate and challenge yourself by playing the timeless game of chess.

holidays.title: National Costume Swap Day
holidays.description: Get ready to make heads turn as we pick out the best costumes for you.

holidays.title: National I Love You Day
holidays.description: Make your loved ones smile and feel loved on National I Love You Day.

holidays.title: National Motorcycle Ride Day
holidays.description: Gear up to go on a biking adventure of a lifetime.

holidays.title: National Ryan Day
holidays.description: It's time for Ryans to step into the spotlight and celebrate their name days.

holidays.title: National Veronica Day
holidays.description: Happy National Veronica Day! Celebrate by getting an “Archie” comic just to spot Veronica.

holidays.title: Universal Music Day
holidays.description: Join the symphony as we celebrate this day with music.

holidays.title: World Hospice and Palliative Care Day
holidays.description: It started as a single concert titled "Come and Sing" and become a worldwide event.

holidays.title: World Standards Day
holidays.description: Global standardization is satisfying the needs of government, industries, businesses, and consumers worldwide.

holidays.title: Carol Capel’s Birthday
holidays.description: If you're into paranormalities, this YouTube star will certainly leave you speechless.

holidays.title: Dillon the Hacker’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this outspoken YouTube star, no one and no topic was off limits.

holidays.title: Dwight D. Eisenhower’s Birthday
holidays.description: This leader will always be remembered for his fearlessness, a history-book-worthy feat.

holidays.title: Fernanda Ramirez’s Birthday
holidays.description: Her style and travel vlogs have catapulted her to success. Let's learn more.

holidays.title: Jared Goff’s Birthday
holidays.description: This football player has demonstrated his skills on the field time and time again.

holidays.title: Jason Plato’s Birthday
holidays.description: He's known as a two-time British Touring Car champion — let's learn more as we celebrate him!

holidays.title: Jelly’s Birthday
holidays.description: This talented YouTuber has posted thousands of videos that his fans absolutely love!

holidays.title: Karyn White’s Birthday
holidays.description: This singer was especially popular in ‘80s and ‘90s! Let's throw it back and learn more!

holidays.title: King James II’s Birthday
holidays.description: Despite his personal shortcomings and flaws, King James II did his best to run England’s monarchy.

holidays.title: Kota ASMR’s Birthday
holidays.description: She is still young and is already an A.S.M.R. social media sensation!

holidays.title: Lourdes Ciccone Leon’s Birthday
holidays.description: Madonna's daughther is carving a name for herself in the fashion industry.

holidays.title: Roger Moore’s Birthday
holidays.description: Moore was cast to play Bond in 1973 and played the character for over 12 years.

holidays.title: Rowan Blanchard’s Birthday
holidays.description: Because of her modeling career and activism, this talented actress has gained a lot of popularity.

holidays.title: Stephen A. Smith’s Birthday
holidays.description: This sports commentator has many other talents, and we're celebrating them all today.

holidays.title: Usher’s Birthday
holidays.description: We celebrate an artist who shot to fame in the 90s and continues to entertain today.
